name: SimpleBloomFilter_mergeTest
description: Unit tests for the merge functionality of the SimpleBloomFilter class.

test_cases.name: testMergeValidBitMapExtractor
test_cases.description: Tests the merge functionality with a valid BitMapExtractor that sets all bits in the first long.

test_cases.name: testMergeInvalidBitMapExtractor
test_cases.description: Tests the merge functionality with an invalid BitMapExtractor that sets bits exceeding the limit, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testMergeBitMapExtractorWithExcessBits
test_cases.description: Tests the merge functionality with a BitMapExtractor that sets a bit higher than the limit for the shape, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testMergeBitMapExtractorWithIndexOutOfBounds
test_cases.description: Tests the merge functionality with a BitMapExtractor that sets bits exceeding the limit and throws an IndexOutOfBoundsException, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
